catalogue.message: No AFP fonts configured. Using default setup.
An error occurred when attempting to encode character set {charSetName} with encoding scheme {encoding}.

The mandatory configuation node: '{missingConfig}' was not found at {location}.
The character set given has an invalid name. [ Reason: {msg} ]
The code page for an AFP font cannot be found.[ Reason: {e}]
Metric information is missing for the glyph `{character}` in the characterset `{charSet}`. Using space increment width.
